verbose_text: In this study, we demonstrate that PARP inhibition elicits an antitumor immune response in Brca1 deficient ovarian tumors by induction of both intratumoral and peripheral effector CD4 + and CD8 + T cells.
evidence: PARP inhibition elicits an antitumor immune response in Brca1-deficient ovarian tumors by induction of both intratumoral and peripheral effector CD4 +  and CD8
